Class com.amagi.validateXML.VastXmlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amagi.validateXML.VastXmlUtils

  • public class com.amagi.validateXML.VastXmlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by priyanka. This class contains util functions to validate a VAST XML URI

            java.lang.String videoDurationMaxLimit,
            java.lang.String[] validConnectionProtocols,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> vastAllowedVersionsXsdMap)
        Constructor of vastXmlUtils
        Parameters:
        wrapperXmlMaxLimit - Max count of wrapper XML's permitted in the VAST URI to be validated
        videoDurationMaxLimit - Max duration of video in the VAST file in HH:mm:ss format
        validConnectionProtocols - List of Applicable connection protocols for VAST URL, Eg. [http, https]
        vastAllowedVersionsXsdMap - Map of vast Allowed Version and file path of their XML Schema Definitions

    • Method Detail

      • validateVastUrl

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject validateVastUrl(java.lang.String vastUrl)
        Function to validate if the vastUrl is a valid URL
        Parameters:
        vastUrl - Vast Url to Validate
        Returns:
        Returns a com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to true vastUrl is valid URL
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 1 if invalid URL

      • validateVastUrl

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject validateVastUrl(java.lang.String vastUrl,
                               java.lang.String[] validConnectionProtocols)
        Function to validate if the vastUrl is a valid URL
        Parameters:
        vastUrl - Vast Url to Validate
        validConnectionProtocols - List of Applicable connection protocols for VAST URL, Eg. [http, https]
        Returns:
        Returns a com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to true if valid URL
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 1 if invalid URL

      • canConnectToUrl

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject canConnectToUrl(java.lang.String vastUrlStr)
        Function to establish connection with the VAST URL
        Parameters:
        vastUrlStr - Vast Url
        Returns:
        Returns a returnObject.
        ValObject is an InputStream if connection successful
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 1.1 if connection unsuccessful

      • getChildTagsFromFirstElement

        public org.w3c.dom.NodeList getChildTagsFromFirstElement(org.w3c.dom.NodeList nodeList,
                                                java.lang.String tagName)
        Function to get NodeList of elements by tag Name from the first element of a nodeList
        Parameters:
        nodeList - All child elements of first object of this node are traversed
        tagName - All elements of type tagname will be fetched
        Returns:
        NodeList of objects which are fetched from the first element of nodeList and are of type tagname

      • fetchMediaFiles

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject fetchMediaFiles(org.w3c.dom.Element linearElement)
        Function to fetch mediaFiles with the following attributes from linear tag of VAST XML-
        1. Delivery attribute should be "progressive"
        2. Type attribute should be "video/mp4"
        Parameters:
        linearElement - The linear DOM element of VAST XML for which the media files are to be fetched
        Returns:
        Returns a com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject contains List if applicable media files are found
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 9 if no applicable media files are found
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 if linearElement is null

      • parseXml

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject parseXml(java.io.InputStream vastInputStream)
        Function to parse VAST XML
        Parameters:
        vastInputStream - VAST InputStream to be parsed
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to DOM parent element if successfully parsed
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 3 if there is an XML parsing exception
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 for errors in parameter passing/setup

      • validateIfVastVersionCompliant

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject validateIfVastVersionCompliant(org.w3c.dom.Element parentElement)
        Function to validate if the VAST file VERSION is compliant with the versions mentioned in VAST_ALLOWED_VERSIONS_XSD_MAP during initialization
        Parameters:
        parentElement - Parent DOM element of VAST file
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        valObject is set to vastVersion if vast is Version Compliant
        Errorobject is set with error code 2 if vast is not Version Compliant

      • validateIfVastXsdCompliant

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject validateIfVastXsdCompliant(java.io.InputStream vastInputStream,
                                          java.io.File vastXsdFile)
        Function to validate if the VAST InputStream is XSD compliant
        Parameters:
        vastInputStream - vastInputStream of the VAST XML to validate
        vastXsdFile - XSD File to validate the VAST XSL inputStream
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to true if VAST InputStream is XSD compliant
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 4.5 if VAST InputStream is not XSD compliant
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 if either XSD file not found or vastInputStream null

      • unWrapWrapperXml

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject unWrapWrapperXml(org.w3c.dom.Element parentElement)
        Function to unwrap wrapper XML and fetch AdTag Url of secondary Ad Server
        The wrapper XML should satify the following constraints
        1. Only one Ad Object should be present in Wrapper XML
        Parameters:
        parentElement - The parent DOM element of wrapper VAST XML
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is the AdTag Url of secondary Ad Server
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 5 if VAST XML has more than one Ad Object
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 4.99 if VAST XML is not a wrapper XML
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 if there is no VASTAdTagURI inside Wrapper
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 if parent DOM element is NULL

      • processAdXml

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject processAdXml(org.w3c.dom.Element parentElement)
        Function to process non-Wrapper XML and fetch media files
        Does the following validations againt non-Wrapper XML
        1. Parent XML element should not be NULL. ErrorCode set with error code 0 otherwise.
        2. Exactly one Ad Object present in VAST XML. ErrorCode set with error code 5 otherwise.
        3. Ad Object should contain only one Inline Object in VAST XML. ErrorCode set with error code 6 otherwise.
        4. Inline Object should contain only one .. tag. ErrorCode set with error code 7 otherwise.
        5. VAST Video Duration <= VIDEO_DURATION_MAX_LIMIT . VIDEO_DURATION_MAX_LIMIT specified in constructor. ErrorCode set with error code 8 otherwise.
        6. VAST file should have atleast 1 MediaFile tag which is both progressive delivery and video/mp4 type. ErrorCode set with error code 9 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        parentElement - The parent DOM element of non wrapper VAST XML
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to List which satisfy constraints #11
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 in case of unexpected internal error
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with appropriate error code if mentioned constraints are not satisfied

      • getBytesFromInputStream

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject getBytesFromInputStream(java.io.InputStream vastInputStream)
        Function to get byteArray from vastInputStream
        Parameters:
        vastInputStream - VAST InputStream to be converted into byteArray
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to byteArray
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 for errors in parameter passing/setup

      • validateVastAndFetchAssets

        public com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject validateVastAndFetchAssets(java.lang.String vastUrl)
        Function to validate vastUrl and fetch MediaAssets after unwrapping the XML and hopping to secondary adServers
        Does the following validations againt vastUrl
        1. VAST URL is a valid URL, valid connection protocols specified as VALID_CONNECTION_PROTOCOLS in constructor. ErrorCode set with error code 1 otherwise.
        2. VAST URL is reachable. ErrorCode set with error code 1.1 otherwise.
        3. VAST URL can be parsed into XML. ErrorCode set with error code 3 otherwise.
        4. VAST URL is vast version compliant, version specified as keys of VAST_ALLOWED_VERSIONS_XSD_MAP in constructor. ErrorCode set with error code 2 otherwise.
        5. VAST XML is compliant with VAST XSD, XSD path specified as values of VAST_ALLOWED_VERSIONS_XSD_MAP against keys in constructor. ErrorCode set with error code 4.5 otherwise.
        6. Number of wrapper XML's are <= WRAPPER_XML_MAX_LIMIT. Value of WRAPPER_XML_MAX_LIMIT specified in constructor. ErrorCode set with error code 4 otherwise.
        7. Only one Ad Object present in VAST XML. ErrorCode set with error code 5 otherwise.
        8. Ad Object should contain only one Inline Object in VAST XML. ErrorCode set with error code 6 otherwise.
        9. Inline Object should contain only one .. tag. ErrorCode set with error code 7 otherwise.
        10. VAST Video Duration <= VIDEO_DURATION_MAX_LIMIT . VIDEO_DURATION_MAX_LIMIT specified in constructor. ErrorCode set with error code 8 otherwise.
        11. VAST file should have atleast 1 MediaFile tag which is both progressive delivery and video/mp4 type. ErrorCode set with error code 9 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        vastUrl - url of the VAST file
        Returns:
        Returns com.amagi.validateXML.VastReturnObject.
        ValObject is set to List which satisfy constraint #11
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with error code 0 in case of unexpected internal error
        com.amagi.validateXML.VastErrorObject is set with appropriate error code if mentioned constraints are not satisfied
